Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is 24/7, so the help is always in time. Teacher's feedback is slower, I might forget the assessment itself when I get the feedback. So, the continuous of my studying is the main point that the feedback impact me.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI will give many information that I may not request.  Teacher provides a clearer and concise feedback.
